com.splunk.logging

Class RestEventData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.splunk.logging.RestEventData

  • public class RestEventData
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to encapsulate URL parameters for submitting events to Splunk via REST endpoints
    Author:
    Damien Dallimore damien@baboonbones.com
